data.comment: Matheus Pereira (Goianiense GO) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Ceara's area.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Ceara's half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Ceara's Vinicius Lima breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara's Fernando Sobral misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Ceara.
Ceara pushes forward through Fabinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 13, Free kick Ceara.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara's Cleber Bomfim attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 18, Ceara's Leo Chu is whistled for offside at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, Attention is being given to Cearaâ€™s Fabinho and play has been suspended briefly.
Fabinho is back on the pitch.
Goianiense GO's Danilo Gomes has run offside.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Castelao.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ceara defender.
In the minute 25, Free kick in a good position for Goianiense GO!
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Throw-in Ceara.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 32, In Fortaleza Ceara's Leo Chu is caught offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Chico.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Chico for Goianiense GO is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Ceara.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Free kick Goianiense GO.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Chico gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 38, Ceara have a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Ceara throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Ceara a goal kick.
Fabinho (Ceara) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO drives forward and Chico gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Goianiense GO's Chico is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Richard is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 45, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows to end the first-half.
Richard is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second half has started at Estadio Castelao.
Pedro Naressi is on a sub for Fabinho for Ceara.
In the minute 46, Saulo is replacing Cleber Bomfim for the home team.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 47, Ceara drive forward but Leo Chu is judged offside.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Ceara's half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden waits before resuming play because Saulo for Ceara is still down.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 53, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Ceara.
In Fortaleza, Marlon Freitas of Goianiense GO is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 55, Goianiense GO pushes forward through Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Danilo Gomes for Goianiense GO is whistled offside.
In the minute 56, Saulo returns to the field for Ceara after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 60, Saulo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Goal! Leo Chu gives Ceara a 1-0 lead.
Wescley instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 66, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 70, Ceara to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Marcelo Cabo (Goianiense GO) is making a first substitution, with Wellington Rato replacing Danilo Gomes.
Ceara make their third substitution with Felipe Silva replacing Wescley.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Ceara's half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Willian Marlon Ferreira Moraes for Goianiense GO has been booked by Leandro Pedro Vuaden and receives a first yellow card.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Gustavo Ferrareis is replacing Janderson Santos de Souza for Goianiense GO at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 75, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
The away team replace Chico with Roberson.
The away team have replaced Nicolas Vichiatto with Natanael Batista Pimenta. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marcelo Cabo.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a penalty in Fortaleza...
In the minute 78, The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Jean.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Fortaleza.
In the minute 82, In Fortaleza Goianiense GO drive forward through Wellington Rato. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Ceara.
Victor Jacare is replacing Leo Chu for the home team.
In the minute 82, Guto Ferreira is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Leandro Carvalho replacing Vinicius Lima.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Goianiense GO make their fifth substitution with Matheus de Vargas replacing Jose Roberto Assuncao de Araujo Filho.
In the minute 84, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Ceara.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Roberson puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Great play from Marlon Freitas to set up the goal.
